duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with new members and guide them through the benefits enrollment process
Foster relationships with existing and new clients
Enroll niche market clients into exclusive benefit programs
Manage benefits for union and association members
Provide excellent customer service and support for employee benefits inquiries
Ensure accuracy and completeness of all documentation
Independently resolve routine and complex benefits issues

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
